title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.55 - Non-structural measures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.55 - Non-structural measures

State Regulations

Flood damage reduction shall be achieved in part through
nonstructural measures. To that end, no project shall be approved under section
3.8
of the compact unless it
complies with such regulations and standards relating to the nature and extent
of the uses of land in flood plains as the commission may adopt and from time
to time amend pursuant to section
6.2
of the
compact. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
890.55

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
